original_title: Hawakan Mo At Pigilan Ang Kahapon
overview: After a doctor's wife died, a former patient charged him of parricide. Is he guilty or is the patient just jealous that the doctor married another woman?
tagline: They try to hold back the hands of time... but sometimes the past must die for the heart to live.
title: Hawakan Mo At Pigilan Ang Kahapon
